title: Fungus Form
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| - | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | You have been transformed into a sentient fungus. You are highly evasive and can release spores to cause confusion when attacking in melee, but are unable to move when hostile creatures are present. You are resistant to poison and immune to negative energy.Any equipped weapons and armour are melded, and you are unable to cast spells. The effectiveness of your melee attacks while in this form is based on experience level instead of on Unarmed Combat skill. |

**Fungus form** is a [bad form](/Bad_form "Bad form") that can be inflicted on the player by the [Polymorph](/Polymorph "Polymorph") spell, turning you into a creature similar to a [wandering mushroom](/Wandering_mushroom "Wandering mushroom").

## Pros

- [Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat"): 12 base damage and a [confusion](/Confusion "Confusion")-branded melee attack (spores).
  - Effectiveness of confusion is based on monster [HD](/HD "HD") instead of [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), but has no effect on [undead](/Undead "Undead"), [nonliving](/Nonliving "Nonliving"), and [plant](/List_of_plants "List of plants") monsters.
- 12 [AC](/AC "AC")
- Tiny [size](/Size "Size")
- [Torment](/Torment "Torment") immunity and [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy")
- [Poison](/Poison "Poison") resistance

## Cons

- The player can't move while there are hostile monsters in [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight").
- The player can't cast [spells](/Spell "Spell").
- All equipment is melded except for [jewellery](/Jewellery "Jewellery").

| Fungus Form                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [![Fungus form.png](/images/4/41/Fungus_form.png)](/File:Fungus_form.png) |

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), fungus form could not confuse [unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing") monsters.
- Prior to [0.22](/0.22 "0.22"), players in fungus form could not use [wands](/Wand "Wand").
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), players in fungus form could wear [hats](/Hat "Hat") and [helmets](/Helmet "Helmet").
- Prior to [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), this form provided a very high [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") modifier, 30.
- Prior to [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), players didn't [hunger](/Hunger "Hunger") and couldn't drink [potions](/Potions "Potions") or eat while in fungus form.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), players in fungus form could not [shout](/Shout "Shout") or command allies.
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), fungus form also gave you one rank of [fire](/Fire "Fire") vulnerability unless you also worshiped [Fedhas Madash](/Fedhas_Madash "Fedhas Madash").
- Fungus form was added in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12").

|                                   | [Transformations](/Transformation "Transformation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Talisman](/Talisman "Talisman")  | [Beast Form](/Beast_Form "Beast Form") • [Flux Form](/Flux_Form "Flux Form") • [Blade Form](/Blade_Form "Blade Form") • [Maw Form](/Maw_Form "Maw Form") • [Serpent Form](/Serpent_Form "Serpent Form") • [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form") • [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form") • [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form") • [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form") |
| [Bad Forms](/Bad_Form "Bad Form") | [Bat Form](/Bat_Form "Bat Form") • [Fungus Form]() • [Pig Form](/Pig_Form "Pig Form") • [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form") • [Wisp Form](/Wisp_Form "Wisp Form")                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| [Divine](/God "God")              | [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
html:
Fungus Form

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
You have been transformed into a sentient fungus. You are highly evasive and can release spores to cause confusion when attacking in melee, but are unable to move when hostile creatures are present. You are resistant to poison and immune to negative energy.

Any equipped weapons and armour are melded, and you are unable to cast spells. The effectiveness of your melee attacks while in this form is based on experience level instead of on Unarmed Combat skill.

Fungus form is a bad form that can be inflicted on the player by the Polymorph spell, turning you into a creature similar to a wandering mushroom.

Pros

  • Unarmed Combat: 12 base damage and a confusion-branded melee attack (spores).
    • Effectiveness of confusion is based on monster HD instead of willpower, but has no effect on undead, nonliving, and plant monsters.
  • 12 AC
  • Tiny size
  • Torment immunity and rN+++
  • Poison resistance

Cons

  • The player can't move while there are hostile monsters in line of sight.
  • The player can't cast spells.
  • All equipment is melded except for jewellery.
Fungus Form

History

  • Prior to 0.27, fungus form could not confuse unbreathing monsters.
  • Prior to 0.22, players in fungus form could not use wands.
  • Prior to 0.20, players in fungus form could wear hats and helmets.
  • Prior to 0.19, this form provided a very high stealth modifier, 30.
  • Prior to 0.15, players didn't hunger and couldn't drink potions or eat while in fungus form.
  • Prior to 0.14, players in fungus form could not shout or command allies.
  • Prior to 0.13, fungus form also gave you one rank of fire vulnerability unless you also worshiped Fedhas Madash.
  • Fungus form was added in 0.12.
Transformations
Talisman Beast Form • Flux Form • Blade Form • Maw Form • Serpent Form • Dragon Form • Statue Form • Death Form • Storm Form
Bad Forms Bat Form • Fungus Form • Pig Form • Tree Form • Wisp Form
Divine Shadow Form

{{flavour|You have been transformed into a sentient fungus. You are highly evasive and can release spores to cause confusion when attacking in melee, but are unable to move when hostile creatures are present. You are resistant to poison and immune to negative energy.

Any equipped weapons and armour are melded, and you are unable to cast spells. The effectiveness of your melee attacks while in this form is based on experience level instead of on Unarmed Combat skill.}}

'''Fungus form''' is a [[bad form]] that can be inflicted on the player by the [[Polymorph]] spell, turning you into a creature similar to a [[wandering mushroom]].

==Pros==
*[[Unarmed Combat]]: 12 base damage and a [[confusion]]-branded melee attack (spores).
**Effectiveness of confusion is based on monster [[HD]] instead of [[willpower]], but has no effect on [[undead]], [[nonliving]], and [[list of plants|plant]] monsters.
*12 [[AC]]
*Tiny [[size]]
*[[Torment]] immunity and [[negative energy|rN+++]]
*[[Poison]] resistance

==Cons==
*The player can't move while there are hostile monsters in [[line of sight]].
*The player can't cast [[spell]]s.
*All equipment is melded except for [[jewellery]].

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], fungus form could not confuse [[unbreathing]] monsters.
*Prior to [[0.22]], players in fungus form could not use [[wand]]s.
*Prior to [[0.20]], players in fungus form could wear [[hat]]s and [[helmet]]s.
*Prior to [[0.19]], this form provided a very high [[stealth]] modifier, 30.
*Prior to [[0.15]], players didn't [[hunger]] and couldn't drink [[potions]] or eat while in fungus form.
*Prior to [[0.14]], players in fungus form could not [[shout]] or command allies.
*Prior to [[0.13]], fungus form also gave you one rank of [[fire]] vulnerability unless you also worshiped [[Fedhas Madash]].
*Fungus form was added in [[0.12]].
